amendment.description: To authorize a land conveyance at Iowa Army Ammunition Plant, Middletown, Iowa.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1463 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1463 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To authorize a land conveyance at Iowa Army Ammunition Plant, Middletown, Iowa.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1463 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1463 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Harkin.
